//03:16:53AM - 05 Sep. 2020

noise(0.0, 4.0)
  .brightness(0.5)
  .invert(() => mouse.y * 0.23)
  .saturate(() => Math.cos(time * 0.8))
.out(o0)

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

//03:17:00AM - 05 Sep. 2020

noise(() => Math.tan(time * 0.9), 4.61)
  .repeatY(0.535, 4.95)
  .add(voronoi(3.0, 1.2, 0.0), 0.2)
.out(o0)
